{
    "Version": "2012-10-17",
    "Statement": [
        {
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": [
                "artifact:AcceptAgreement",
                "artifact:DownloadAgreement",
                "artifact:TerminateAgreement"
            ],
            "Resource": [
                "arn:aws:artifact::*:customer-agreement/*",
                "arn:aws:artifact:::agreement/*"
            ]
        },
        {
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": [
                "organizations:DescribeOrganization"
            ],
            "Resource": "*"
        }
    ]
}
